SELL $TSLA -Workers report "chronic defects & struggle with basic manufacturing" https://www.reuters.com/article/us-tesla-quality-insight/build-fast-fix-later-speed-hurts-quality-at-tesla-some-workers-say-idUSKBN1DT0N3?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=Social

links.title: Build fast, fix later: speed hurts quality at Tesla, some workers say
links.description: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - After Tesla's Model S sedans and Model X SUVs roll off the company's Fremont, California assembly line, the electric vehicles usually make another stop - for repairs, nine current and former employees have told Reuters. The luxury cars regularly require fixes before they can leave the factory, according to the workers.

messages.body:
#Wayfair stock shorts need to ignore @CitronResearch  $AMZN $W $VRX $EXAS $TSLA $NVDA https://investorplace.com/2017/12/is-amazon-furniture-
wayfairs-new-bogeyman/

links.title: Will Amazon's New Furniture Lines Prove to be Wayfair's New Bogeyman?
links.description: Brian Wu, InvestorPlace Contributor About a fortnight ago, furniture-related stocks suffered a nasty jolt in the wake of Amazon.com, Inc.'s (NASDAQ:) first foray into the furniture and home goods universe. Wayfair Inc (NYSE:) fared worse than most, with W stock tanking nearly 7%, after the online retailer unveiled two new furnishing lines.
